title: Out of the built up area proposed to be utilized for residential purpose as per zonal basic FSI, minimum 20% built up area shall be used for commercial purpose as permissible in these regulations
clause_text: Out of the built up area proposed to be utilized for residential purpose as per zonal basic FSI, minimum 20% built up area shall be used for commercial purpose as permissible in these regulations.
section: Conversion of Industrial Zone to Residential or Commercial Zone for the Uses permissible in Residential or Commercial Zone

source_pdf.text_snippet: Out of the built up area proposed to be utilized for residential purpose as per zonal basic FSI, minimum 20% built up area shall be used for commercial purpose as permissible in these regulations.
